title: The Forgotten Village (Docutainment, 1941) Burgess Meredith & John Steinbeck

sources.title: The Forgotten Village (Docutainment, 1941) Burgess Meredith & John Steinbeck
sources.description:
Documentary examining the conflicts between the coming of modernization and the traditional culture of a small Mexican village.


Directors: Herbert Kline, Alexander Hammid 
Writers: John Steinbeck
Star: Burgess Meredith
Genres: Documentary, Docutainment, Drama 


00:00 Full Documentary style film
01:41 Life in a rural village revolves around corn farming, prophecies, and family dynamics.
09:38 Traditional remedies clash with modern medicine in a village plagued by sickness.
25:33 A village faces a mysterious illness, seeking help from modern medicine against traditional beliefs.
39:41 Strangers bring modern medicine to a remote village, facing resistance and accusations of poisoning.
58:25 A story of transformation and hope in rural Mexico as young people bring change to their villages.

@CultCinemaClassics
